metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21240 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: httplib2 is a comprehensive HTTP client library for Python. In httplib2before version 0.19.0, a malicious server which responds with long seriesof "\xa0" characters in the "www-authenticate" header may cause Denial ofService (CPU burn while parsing header) of the httplib2 client accessingsaid server. This is fixed in version 0.19.0 which contains a newimplementation of auth headers parsing using the pyparsing library.

criterions.comment: python-httplib2 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
